item.title: Software Engineering as a Craft
item.description: A few months ago a prominent figure in the tech and software space was uninvited from a conference1. In an (intentionally humorous) summary of this person, Melissa McEwan wrote a Tech Bullshit Explained about the person. I don’t want to talk about any of allegations or (tellingly-immature) reactions to the allegations, but something McEwan said in her post didn’t seem to fit, and to me seemed a little too far.
